lines.text: It was just like this place... all those bombs. Oh! Oh my poor head. I hate the jungle and its humidity.
Come now. It's all over now.
The blood was all over the place. I can't take it. Not again. Get me outta here. I can't get these painful memories out if my head
Calm down. Come on... you most control yourself
Wait a minute. Let me take a pill.
That'll be better. It'll steady my nerves.
I'm sorry, Peter. But I just can't get it out of my mind. I was the only one who survived. You know that? The only one!
I know, I know. You'll get over it in time. I promise.
